attributes.action: repeal all act's that was enforced on England by sottish pm's blare and brown !
attributes.additional_details: whow can a scottish pm legally enforce law's onto the english
attributes.background:
England did not have equality because it did not have its own parliament or assembly , so did not have equality in British government when under Scottish pm's blair and brown .
a lot of the illegal act's contradict the principles of english law.
separation of law and religion .
one law for all .
